meanings.definition: To go beyond the limits of
meanings.sent1: She was transcending her fears by facing them head-on.
meanings.sent2: The athlete was transcending his previous records with each race.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was transcending gravity when it jumped off the couch.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was transcending the noise of the crowd, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The sun transcending the horizon painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The student was transcending expectations with his exceptional grades.
meanings.sent2: The company's profits were transcending all previous records.
meanings.sent3: The cake transcended deliciousness and entered the realm of divine.
meanings.sent4: His kindness transcended mere politeness, touching everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The rocket transcending the speed of sound left a trail of awe in its wake.

meanings.definition: To rise above or go beyond the ordinary
meanings.sent1: Her artwork was transcending the usual boundaries of creativity.
meanings.sent2: The music was transcending genres, appealing to a wide audience.
meanings.sent3: The dog seemed to think it was transcending normal dog behavior by wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: His wisdom was transcending his years, surprising even the elders.
meanings.sent5: The dancer's performance was transcending, leaving the audience in awe.
